body: Hello everyone. My target building is divided into two parts because of their different levels, but there is a ground floor can never be generated when I use "Mass2Zones". Is there anyone can help me to solve this problem? Thanks in advance. Roy [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/ENQTjlbUh08qlhYO7ixc721BjZOdqsbjuQHTO-4r3*y0wsd4q6s*mYzJoR-vK8kLmdBDKrKkGmNDQsf5Y2zmt4Y2KYvSxVAn/QQ20170224175208.png) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/ENQTjlbUh08YCpRPqxuQi8qp8u*W8l9EuC4NJU7wT0*QeCBatlrCks1F75V2yU7yICV9Fqpr3F3icUVZg8uQuxK5hJKFZP52/QQ20170224175041.png)
topic: How to deal with the level difference of the two parts in a single building

replies.body: Yi, you forgot to internalise brep.
The floor is generated but it's not a ground floor. check the output for  exposedFloors.
